name: Windows NetLM Downgrade Attack
author: Brandon McCann "zeknox" <bmccann@accuvant.com>
Thomas McCarthy "smilingraccoon" <smilingraccoon@gmail.com>
description:
This module will change a registry value to enable
        the sending of LM challenge hashes and then initiate a SMB connection to
        the SMBHOST datastore. If an SMB server is listening, it will receive the
        NetLM hashes

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SMBHOST
options.description: IP Address where SMB host is listening to capture hashes.
